comment: As long as you turn everything in, you should land with a high A. She is very kind and understanding. The class can get frustrating but overall the professor made it easier. Although I took nothing from this class, I would take it again with her.

I wouldn't listen much to the other review. The assignments for 3360 can be time-consuming, but they are very simple and easy. The only time the workload was ever a lot was having to do lesson plans and a reading reflection, but she made the deadlines reasonable. Dr. Delacruz is super understanding and sweet! I'd definitely take her again.

not sure how this prof has such high ratings. she's not bad but definitely not great. i took her online 3360. heavy workload and her emails are often not helpful. she's not always nice about questions either and her assignments frequently had typos, repeat questions, etc.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Lots of homework

comment: Loved Dr. Delacruz!! Would 100% take honors with her if you are an education major. As long as you follow her rubrics you will likely get 100s and she gave me the opportunity to fix something I missed on an assignment!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: Dr. Delacruz created a positive and fun environment to learn in. She was always willing to be flexible if needed as she was understanding of what the work load included during this phase of our degree. I really enjoyed our group assignment and loved that she gave us plenty of class time to complete the work. You will not regret taking her course!

TAKE DR. DELACRUZ. This woman is an amazing professor and person. She wants to see her students succeed and gives the most amazing feedback. Her assignments are clear and she responds to emails quickly. I was bummed that this class got moved to online because of COVID-19, but the professor still made the class engaging and fun. Take her!!!
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: The only thing id like to change is communication. Her directions were sometimes vague and unclear. She was very easy to get in contact with and she was approachable. I took her online course and got an A. Turn in everything and you should be fine. A couple flip grid vid assignments but nothing major. No final.

Professor Delacruz truly wants to prepare her students to be awesome teachers and to get ready for edTPA. Her lectures were engaging and I felt like her assignments genuinely helped me. She has a strict attendance policy and doesn't typically accept late work. Her class was definitely one of my favorites- take her while you're student teaching!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: I would definitely take Dr. Delacruz again. She was helpful and accommodating when I reached out for help. Her criteria and assignments are clear and she makes class interactive and fun.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: I took her online class. Got a 100. She had just had a baby so I am not sure if that had anything to do with it, but overall she was a great online professor. She emails you and even gave the entire class a chance to re do an assignment that we did poorly on. I highly recommend.

LOVED Professor Delacruz. She always came prepared with realistic material to use in classrooms. She even gives her students materials to use in their personal classroom. Professor Delacruz really knows what she is talking about. I would recommend her to anyone! Take her if you have the chance. I would take her again if I could.

All that is due in this class is 5 journals. Since this is your only grade, your attendance is mandatory and a good portion of your grade. She is very sweet and likes to know you understand and participate. Very sweet lady! Would take again!

This class has weekly lit circles (with short chapter books) along with a weekly chapter summary required for the textbook. This goes on for about 10 weeks and you will need to present a reading strategy lesson during 1 week. After that you will work on the class's signature project which is like a mini EdTPA. Dr. D is very sweet and caring.

Absolutely love Dr. Delacruz. Her assignments are very clear and the students know what is expected of them. I learned so much about teaching during this class and I feel so much more prepared! The assignments require thought and work but if you do the reading then you will do well on the assignments!

I've taken 2 of her classes. Super sweet and easy to talk too. You will know exactly what you need to get done for the semester and she is not a tough grader. Get your tutor hours and work turned in, and you should definitely get an easy A. Take her class whenever possible!!!! There are some awesome projects and assignments in her classes.

Dr. Delacruz is by far the best professor I have had. I had her for numerous classes, and if you want to be an amazing teacher take her class, you will not regret it. She has so many classroom ideas that will get u so anxious to be in the classroom with the students. If you give her the effort she will give it right back x10. GREAT PROFESSOR!
Amazing teacher.  Had her for TOSS and she had great ideas for the classroom.  Wonderful professor and mentor.  Always willing to go the extra mile for her students.
Dr. Delacruz is the best teacher I have had! You will learn ALOT from her! She knows her stuff. Willing to work with you through almost anything. So Sweet!! TAKE HER!!!
Best teacher i've ever had at KSU. She helps you and you really learn from her. She gave so many resources to us that we can use in our future classrooms. Take her if you can!!
I really enjoyed her class.  I had her for 3320 and 3340. She has lots of fun ideas for you to try in tutoring and her lectures are interesting. I would definitely take classes from her again.
